hibernate-mapping.sql-query: UPDATE EO_WORK_ORDER EOWO SET EOWO.REC_VER = EOWO.REC_VER + 1, EOWO.Eowo_Delivery_Reservation_No = :reservationNo, EOWO.Eowo_Delivery_Reservation_Date = :reservationDate, EOWO.Eowo_Require_Consignee_Time = :requireConsignee WHERE EOWO.EOWO_VAMP_NO IN (:eowoVampNos) and EOWO.Eowo_Delivery_Reservation_Date is null
